name: Catstards
description:
TIDINESS POLICE IS AROUND YOUR HOUSE AND THEY WILL ARREST YOU IF THEY FIND YOUR ROOM IS MESSY.

KEEP YOUR ROOM TIDY BUT... BEWARE OF THE CATS! THESE LITTLE FLUFFY DEMONS WILL TRY TO MESS UP YOUR ROOM WHILE THE POLICEMAN IS PATROLLING YOUR HOME.

TO STOP THEM YOU NEED TO CLICK ON THEM WHEN THEY ARE ACTING.
IF YOU AREN'T FAST ENOUGH YOU STILL HAVE A CHANCE TO FIX THE MESS BY HOLDING LEFT CLICK IN THE OBJECT DISORDERED.

THESE LITTLE BASTARDS WILL FALL SLEEP WHEN THE POLICEMAN ARRIVES AT YOUR ROOM.

#################

HIGSCORES ARE  NOT AVAILABLE IN WEB!!

################# 

THIS GAME HAS BEEN DEVELOPED DURING GLOBAL GAME JAM 2019

#################
